statements: SELECT entry_id, entry_date, description, debit_amount, credit_amount FROM journal_entries;
SELECT entry_date, description, debit_amount, credit_amount, entry_id FROM journal_entries;
SELECT description, credit_amount, entry_id, debit_amount, entry_date FROM journal_entries;
SELECT * FROM journal_entries WHERE entry_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT entry_date, description FROM journal_entries WHERE credit_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM journal_entries WHERE entry_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY entry_date DESC, entry_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT entry_id, entry_date, description FROM journal_entries WHERE debit_amount > 100 OR credit_amount > 100 ORDER BY entry_date ASC;
SELECT entry_date, description, (debit_amount + credit_amount) AS total_amount FROM journal_entries WHERE entry_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT entry_id, description, debit_amount FROM journal_entries WHERE description LIKE '%payroll%' AND debit_amount > credit_amount ORDER BY debit_amount DESC;
SELECT entry_date, description, credit_amount FROM journal_entries WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY entry_date ASC, credit_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM journal_entries;
SELECT entry_id, amount, date, description FROM journal_entries WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT start_date, end_date, statement_type FROM financial_statements;
SELECT * FROM journal_entries WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT description, amount FROM journal_entries WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM journal_entries WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC, amount ASC
SELECT entry_id, description, amount FROM journal_entries WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT date, description FROM journal_entries WHERE description LIKE '%expense%' OR description LIKE '%payment%'
SELECT statement_id, statement_type FROM financial_statements WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM journal_entries JOIN financial_statements ON journal_entries.date = financial_statements.start_date
SELECT * FROM journal_entries;
SELECT entry_id, amount FROM journal_entries WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT entry_date, entry_description FROM journal_entries WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT statement_id, total_amount FROM financial_statements WHERE statement_type = 'Income';
SELECT * FROM journal_entries WHERE entry_id = 1
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT statement_id, total_amount FROM financial_statements WHERE statement_type = 'Profit and Loss' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT entry_date, amount FROM journal_entries WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY entry_date ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' AND role = 'editor'
SELECT * FROM JournalEntries;
SELECT id, date, account_name FROM Accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT statement_type, total_amount FROM FinancialStatements WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT description FROM JournalEntries WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT account_number, account_name, account_type FROM Accounts WHERE account_type = 'Asset';
SELECT * FROM JournalEntries WHERE date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT id, date, journal_type FROM JournalEntries WHERE journal_type = 'Income' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM JournalEntries WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialStatements WHERE statement_type = 'Balance Sheet';
SELECT id, date, account_number, account_name FROM Accounts ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM journal_entries ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT entry_id, description, amount FROM journal_entries WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_statements WHERE period_start > '2022-01-01' AND period_end < '2022-12-31';
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Income';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM journal_entries WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY entry_date DESC
SELECT entry_date, description FROM journal_entries WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY entry_id ASC
SELECT entry_id, description, amount FROM journal_entries WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM financial_statements WHERE period_end < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY period_start DESC
SELECT statement_id, statement_type FROM financial_statements WHERE period_start >= '2021-01-01' AND period_end <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY statement_id DESC
